scripts.prepare:mumbai: mustache config/mumbai.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && npm run codegen
scripts.prepare:local: mustache config/local.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && npm run codegen
scripts.prepare:matic: mustache config/mumbai.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && npm run codegen
scripts.t: yarn remove-local && yarn create-local && yarn deploy-local
